article: This is a photo of Mr Black's family. The man with glasses is Mr Black, the father. The woman is the mother. They have a son and a daughter. The son is behind Mr Black. His name is Jack. He's 14. Kate is Jack's sister. She is 12. Jack and Kate are in the same school, but they are in different grades. Jack is in Grade Three and Kate's in Grade One. They are good students.
questions: Jack and Kate are in the same_ .
